per_question.question: How many vacation days do new employees get?
per_question.expected_answer: New employees (0-2 years) receive 15 vacation days per year
per_question.actual_answer: New employees with 0-2 years of service receive 15 days of annual vacation time, which accrues at 1.25 days per month. [Source: pto_policy.md]

per_question.question: How many sick days are provided per year?
per_question.actual_answer: All full-time employees receive 10 sick days per year. Sick leave accrues at 0.83 days per month. [Source: pto_policy.md]

per_question.question: Can unused vacation days be carried over to the next year?
per_question.expected_answer: Maximum 5 days can be carried over to the next calendar year
per_question.actual_answer: Unused vacation days can be carried over to the next year, but with a maximum of 5 days. Unused days beyond the limit will be forfeited on December 31st. [Source: pto_policy.md]

per_question.question: Can I work from home?
per_question.expected_answer: Yes, with manager approval, after 90 days of employment
per_question.actual_answer: To work from home, you must meet the eligibility criteria, which includes being in a role suitable for remote work, having a good performance history, manager approval, and completing at least 90 days of employment (probation completion). [Source: remote_work_policy.md]

per_question.question: What internet speed is required for remote work?
per_question.actual_answer:
Remote employees must have a workspace with a reliable internet connection with a minimum download speed of 25 Mbps. 

[Source: remote_work_policy.md]

per_question.question: Is there a home office stipend?
per_question.expected_answer: Yes, a one-time $500 stipend for home office setup and $50/month internet stipend
per_question.actual_answer: Yes, there is a home office setup stipend of $500, which is a one-time stipend for new remote arrangements. It requires receipts and manager approval. [Source: remote_work_policy.md]

per_question.question: What is the daily meal limit when traveling?
per_question.actual_answer:
The daily meal limit when traveling is $90. 

[Source: Expense Reimbursement Policy (expense_policy.md)]

per_question.question: What is the hotel limit for New York City?
per_question.actual_answer: The hotel limit for New York City is $250/night. This is for Tier 1 cities, which also include San Francisco and Los Angeles. [Source: expense_policy.md]

per_question.question: How long do I have to submit expense reports?
per_question.expected_answer: Within 30 days of incurring the expense
per_question.actual_answer: You must submit expense reports within 30 days of incurring the expense. [Source: expense_policy.md]

per_question.question: What are the password requirements?
per_question.expected_answer: Minimum 12 characters, with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
per_question.actual_answer:
According to the Information Security Policy, all passwords must meet the following requirements:

- Minimum length: 12 characters
- Complexity: Must include uppercase letters (A-Z), lowercase letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and special characters (!@#$%^&*)
- No common patterns: Avoid dictionary words, your name, or "password"
- Unique passwords: Do not reuse passwords across systems

[Source: security_policy.md]

per_question.question: How often must passwords be changed?
per_question.actual_answer: Passwords must be changed every 90 days. [Source: security_policy.md]

per_question.question: What happens after 5 failed login attempts?
per_question.expected_answer: Account locks after 5 failed attempts, auto-unlocks after 30 minutes
per_question.actual_answer: Accounts lock after 5 failed login attempts. Contact IT to unlock accounts, and automated unlock after 30 minutes. Repeated lockouts may trigger security review. [Source: security_policy.md]

per_question.question: Do I need to use VPN when working remotely?
per_question.expected_answer: Yes, always use VPN to access company resources when working remotely
per_question.actual_answer: Yes, when working remotely, employees must always use the company VPN to access company resources. [Source: security_policy.md]

per_question.question: What is the 401k company match?
per_question.actual_answer:
The 401(k) company match is 100% match on the first 4% of salary. 

[Source: Employee Benefits Policy (benefits_policy.md)]

per_question.question: How long is paid parental leave for birth parents?
per_question.actual_answer: Paid parental leave for birth parents is 16 weeks paid at 100%. [Source: Employee Benefits Policy (benefits_policy.md)]

per_question.question: What is the tuition reimbursement limit?
per_question.actual_answer: The tuition reimbursement limit is up to $5,250/year for degree programs. [Source: benefits_policy.md]

per_question.question: Is there a wellness stipend?
per_question.expected_answer: $600/year wellness reimbursement for gym, fitness equipment, mental health apps
per_question.actual_answer: Yes, there is a wellness stipend of $600/year, which can be used for gym memberships, fitness equipment, mental health apps, and other wellness-related expenses. Employees can submit receipts through the expense system. [Source: benefits_policy.md]

per_question.question: How many paid holidays are there?
per_question.actual_answer: There are **12 paid holidays per year**. [Source: holiday_schedule.md]

per_question.question: Is Juneteenth a company holiday?
per_question.expected_answer: Yes, June 19th is a paid company holiday
per_question.actual_answer: Yes, Juneteenth is a company holiday. It is observed on June 19, 2025, which is a Thursday. [Source: holiday_schedule.md]

per_question.question: Are there floating holidays?
per_question.expected_answer: Yes, 2 floating holidays per year for religious observances or personal celebrations
per_question.actual_answer: Yes, employees receive 2 floating holidays per year. They can be used for religious observances, personal celebrations, or any purpose, and must be scheduled with manager approval. [Source: holiday_schedule.md]

per_question.question: What is the company's harassment policy?
per_question.expected_answer: Zero tolerance policy for harassment, all reports investigated, confirmed harassment results in disciplinary action up to termination
per_question.actual_answer:
Acme Corporation has a zero-tolerance policy for harassment, which includes unwelcome conduct based on protected characteristics such as:
- Race, color, or ethnicity
- Gender, gender identity, or sexual orientation
- Age
- Religion
- Disability
- National origin
- Any other protected characteristic

Examples of harassment include:
- Offensive jokes or slurs
- Physical intimidation or assault
- Unwanted sexual advances
- Displaying offensive materials
- Exclusion from activities based on protected characteristics

All reports of harassment will be investigated promptly, and confirmed harassment will result in disciplinary action up to termination. [Source: code_of_conduct.md]

per_question.question: What is the gift acceptance limit?
per_question.expected_answer: Gifts under $100 may be accepted, gifts over $100 must be reported to compliance
per_question.actual_answer:
Gifts under $100 may be accepted. Gifts over $100 must be reported to compliance. 

[Source: code_of_conduct.md]

per_question.question: How long is the probationary period?
per_question.actual_answer: The probationary period for new employees at Acme Corporation is 90 days. During this time, performance will be closely monitored, regular feedback sessions will be conducted, and employment may be terminated at will by either party. [Source: employee_handbook.md]

per_question.question: How much notice should I give when resigning?
per_question.expected_answer: 2 weeks for non-management, 4 weeks for management
per_question.actual_answer:
Employees wishing to resign should provide:
- **Non-management**: 2 weeks written notice
- **Management**: 4 weeks written notice

[Source: employee_handbook.md]
